title: Enhancing App Development Competencies: Reading Disability Response Strategies in Multimedia Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: When designing multimedia lessons, learners can distinguish assignment types (procedural, affective, infographic, argumentative) that consider the characteristics of students with reading disabilities.
Learners can propose at least three criteria for selecting optimal assignment types to assess the learning outcomes of students with reading disabilities.
Learners can complete a practical project adjusting the balance between visual elements and text in mobile-based microlearning environments.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
